tasks.title: [Tree2mydoor] Verify Black Friday ROAS experiment status (likely root cause of 28pp POAS decline)
tasks.notes:
**From Weekly Report - Dec 22, 2025**

**Issue:** Account POAS 28pp lower than same period last year (153% vs 180%)

**Most Likely Root Cause:**
- Black Friday experiment (Nov 24th) reduced campaign ROAS targets from 140-150% to 120%
- Task in CONTEXT.md notes "Revert by Tuesday Nov 25" but unclear if this happened
- If still at 120% targets, this explains systematic POAS compression across all campaigns

**Actions Required:**
1. Check current ROAS/POAS targets in Google Ads for these campaigns:
   - P Max HP&P (should be 150% if reverted, 120% if experiment still running)
   - P Max Unprofitable (should be 150%)
   - Search Roses (should be 150%)
   - Shopping Catch All (should be 150%)
   - Shopping Low Traffic (should be 140%)

2. If still at 120% experimental levels:
   - Revert to pre-experiment targets immediately
   - Monitor 48-hour post-reversion performance
   - Document in CONTEXT.md that reversion completed

3. If already at correct levels:
   - Document that experiment was properly reverted
   - Investigate other causes of YoY POAS decline (P Max HP&P investigation becomes priority)

**Context:**
- YoY comparison: Dec 8-20, 2025 (153% POAS) vs Dec 8-20, 2024 (180% POAS)
- Seasonal compression is normal, but magnitude is 3x worse than last year
- Week 2 (Dec 15-20) showed severe compression: 134% POAS with some unprofitable days

**Timeline:** Complete by Wednesday 25th December

Full report: clients/tree2mydoor/reports/weekly/2025-12-22-weekly-report.md
